Fit a list of parsnip models

Source: R/utils.R
fit_parsnip_models.Rd

This allows for the simple fitting of multiple models. It requires three components: a formula, a parsnip model definition, and a data set to analyze.

fit_parsnip_models(.formula, .test, .opts = NULL, .data)

Arguments

.formula

List or vector of formulas
.test

A model definition from parsnip
.opts

Options to pass to the test, if needed
.data

Data set to be used

Value

Returns a list of model fits

See also

Other helpers: fit_calls(), tidy_tests()
